#include <stdio.h>
#include <stdlib.h>
#include <iostream>

using namespace std;

int input()
{
    int n=0;
    char c=getchar_unlocked();
    while(c < '0' || c >'9') {c=getchar_unlocked();}
    while(c>='0' && c<='9')
    {
        n=(n<<3)+(n<<1)+c-'0';
        c=getchar_unlocked();
    }
    return n;
}

int main(){
	int T;
	T = input();
	int x1, x2, y1, y2, z1, z2, w1, w2;
	int nx1, nx2, ny1, ny2;
	int res, temp;
	while(T--){
		x1 = input();
		y1 = input();
		x2 = input();
		y2 = input();
		z1 = input();
		w1 = input();
		z2 = input();
		w2 = input();
		nx1 = max(x1, z1);
		ny1 = max(y1, w1);
		nx2 = min(x2, z2);
		ny2 = min(y2, w2);
		res = (x2-x1)*(y2-y1);
		res += (z2-z1)*(w2-w1);
		if((nx2 > nx1) && (ny2 > ny1))
			temp = abs(nx2-nx1)*abs(ny2-ny1);
		else
			temp = 0;
		cout << (res - temp) << endl;
	}
}
